insertDoctor: INSERT INTO pantax.doctors (name, prof_stat, pract_name, picture_url) VALUES (? , ? , ?, ?)
INSERT INTO pantax.doctors ( name, prof_stat, pract_name, picture_url) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ? )
updateDoctor: UPDATE pantax.doctors set name=?, prof_stat=?, pract_name=?, picture_url=? where id=?
findDoctorByCategory: SELECT d.* FROM pantax.doctors d inner join pantax.doctor_category dc on d.id = dc.doctor_id WHERE dc.category_id = ?
updateDoctorAppointmentOption: UPDATE pantax.doctor_appointment_options SET week_day = ?, from_time = ? , to_time = ? WHERE id = ?
getDoctorAppointmentOptions: SELECT id,week_day, from_time, to_time FROM pantax.doctor_appointment_options WHERE doctor_id = ?
updatePatient: UPDATE pantax.patient SET name=? WHERE id=?;
